question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. blue flag with letter on it
B. post office sign
C. None
D. None

options.A: blue flag with letter on it

triage_reason: The blue flag with lettering is hanging prominently in the foreground, while the post office sign is on a building further back, making the flag clearly closer based on visual layering.
